entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
